original_title: Sri Lanka’s mid day shares up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade on Thursday, on banking counters as debt restructuring fears have eased and banking shares are still undervalued, an analyst said.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.24 percent or 26.67 points to 10,953.96, while S&P SL20 was up 0.18 percent or 5.64 points to 3,19.18.
Top gainers during mid day trade were Expolanka, Melstacorp, Ceylon Tobacco Company. (Colombo/July20/2023)
